Text:
I made a patch for this to get the game to full English. Unfortunately it was removed due to the crack in this copy giving false positives. I have created a new torrent with only the English files and can be downloaded here it is 6MB in size. Use it with this copy as I can no longer include the game at the risk of another misban

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6054210/Hacker_Evolution_Untold_-_Patch_files_for_Russian_to_English_sup

English support for this copy can be downloaded here

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6054210/Hacker_Evolution_Untold_-_Patch_files_for_Russian_to_English_sup
